front.title: Feature Analysis Tool for stateless IPv4/IPv6 (MAP-T, MAP-E, 4rd)

abstract.t: This document proposes a discussion tool for the Softwire meeting at IETF 83 in Paris. Significant differentiating features between the MAP approach (proposed standards MAP-T and MAP-E) and the unified approach (proposed standard 4rd) are presented in tabular format. Its purpose is to facilitate decision making, and is therefore temporary.
